DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal line research develop evaluate innovative treatment lesbian , gay , bisexual , transgender ( LGBT ) cigarette smoker understand process related smoking relapse previously unstudied population smoker . In study , participant randomly assign one two Internet-based smoke cessation treatment : 1 ) self-help intervention tailor LGBT smoker plus social support plus email-based counseling , 2 ) standard self-help condition alone , similar general smoking cessation treatment . Before start program , participant complete measure smoke , nicotine dependence , depression diagnosis , demographic , mood , motivation change , alcohol use . Smoking status determine 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month follow start treatment . Data analyze compare quit rate two Internet-based treatment group . Also , complete exploratory analysis determine variable best predict quit LGBT smoker .
DOC.criteria: Must identify lesbian , gay male , bisexual male female transgender individual . Must smoke day precede month . Must valid email address .
